name: Merge invader
description:
Hi,

This is our submission for the spacejam. Merge invader is a very simple game, your goal is to kill enemy and survive. But there is a twist, your character will duplicate after a certain period of time. Your weapon is not always active, otherwise I will be too easy....

We didn't have the time to finish the graphics of the game, so there are pretty terrible.

This game was made by Gabriel and Florian
